title: When its 4v5, you're playing like ass, down 7k, 3 infernal, and the enemy is at your nexus...
body:
...but your team keeps their cool and you win anyway.

This. This is why I rarely surrender.

Yes, I do? What a weird thing to assert. I'm guessing you think I'm in high school or something. I'm 31 years old...
So you don't surrender to make other people carry you when you feed?

If the match is truly lost then it'll be over after the next teamfight anyway.
Play it out, both for your team's sake and theirs.

If you are in a 4v5 and your team is willing to fight, keep going.  If you can catch 1 enemy out you've got a minute or so where it's 4v4 and you can do something.  Yeah it's tough and the odds are against you, but that's what gitten gud is all about.
